page.title: 12HOUSING IN COWFOLD.
page.content: A large percentage of houses in Cowfold are situated along the main roads or on estates leading off the main roads.There is a wide variety of houses in both age and design.The oldest houses are along the church Path and the newest houses are on the building site of Oakfield Rd.The types of houses in Cowfold include flats, bungalows,terraced houses, semi-detached and detached houses. The centre of Cowfold,around the Church,is a conservation area, including several listed buildings. Approx.one third of the houses is rented,although the vast majority are owner occupied.Cowfold is an expensive area in which to live.It is within easy commuting distance of London or of the coast,and many people like to live in the country.A detached house in Cowfold can sell for Â£90,000.
